results.content: Kamran: The course is really good. Would like to know more on how you display all the chats, messages and related conversations
results.content_html: Kamran: The course is really good. Would like to know more on how you display all the chats, messages and related conversations

results.content: Instructor doesn't explain much of anything he is doing. Otherwise, it's fine if you just want to code along and build something. You should already understand all of React and ContextAPI if you do though.
results.content_html: Instructor doesn't explain much of anything he is doing. Otherwise, it's fine if you just want to code along and build something. You should already understand all of React and ContextAPI if you do though.
